conversations.body_text: Hi xaritos marnieros,    Sorry for the delayed response. We are currently processing shipments in batches and will refund your extra shipping charges.

I even payed 25 euros more to be here in 7 days

Στάλθηκε από Outlook για Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

A least give me the tracking number so i know where is my packet

Στάλθηκε από Outlook για Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi xaritos marnieros,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the HS Pro, and we will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible.

Hi xaritos marnieros,    Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We will arrange shipment within the next two days and sincerely apologize for the delay.     https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2600700706234700

Please refund me the the 180 euros that i payed amd cancel the the order
